description:
Note: This content is also included in the "Anime Final Season Costume Set for 16 Playable Characters" that is available as a separate purchase. Be careful to avoid making a redundant purchase.

Special Erza Costume: Anime Final Season is added.

Note: Costumes can be changed from the "Dresser" at "Lucy's House" after advancing the game to a certain point.
name: Erza's Costume "Anime Final Season"
